name: Molecular Barrier Recovery Cream Balm
shortDescription: Restorative ceramide-rich treatment that supports a resilient skin barrier.
description: A nourishing treatment balm infused with ceramides, niacinamide, and a reparative peptide complex to cocoon stressed complexions. It melts into the skin to soothe irritation, reinforce the moisture barrier, and leave the complexion supple and calm.
usage: Warm a pea-sized amount between fingertips and press into clean skin as the final step of your evening routine, or whenever skin needs extra comfort.

name: Crystal Retinal 10 Serum
shortDescription: High-strength retinal night serum that visibly softens fine lines and clarifies the complexion.
description: Medik8's Crystal Retinal 10 delivers clinical-strength retinaldehyde to revitalise dull, uneven skin tones. Stabilised with Medik8's Crystal Retinal technology and balanced by hydrating hyaluronic acid, it refines texture while supporting skin clarity.
usage: Evenings only. After cleansing, apply a small amount across the face and neck, avoiding the eye area. Follow with moisturiser. Introduce gradually 2-3 times per week before building to nightly use.

name: Triple Hyaluronic Antioxidant Hydration Serum
shortDescription: Weightless daily serum with three molecular weights of hyaluronic acid for lasting hydration.
description: This daily hydration serum bathes skin in layered moisture while fortifying with antioxidants and peptides. Three forms of hyaluronic acid work alongside silk amino acids and superoxide dismutase to plump, smooth, and protect against environmental stressors.
usage: Apply 1-2 pumps to damp skin after cleansing and before moisturiser, both morning and evening.
